segments.text: Judy , have you ever made out how much money shall we spend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yeah . The total amount is no less than 13,000 RIB , according to our itinerary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sit down . I'll show you the list of our financial budget . First of all , it is nearly 4,000 RIB that we should spend in transportation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , the transportation fee always takes a great part in the budget .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then we must pay a large amount of money for the hotel . But if we want to save money , we can choose a hotel which is not so good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm , what I'm fearful of is that the accommodation will also deteriorate once we choose a cheaper hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In that case , we can choose the Youth Hotel . It's a good choice , clean and economic .
segments.speaker: S2
